name: CyberSoul (Gassy900)
description: This game was developed over the last 6 months. There is about 4 days of actual programming time. The goal of the game is to collect as many souls as possible while exploring a randomly generated world. You will face enemies and randomly generated structures that will challenge you. The goal is to get 5000 souls to spawn in the final boss to beat the game. You are timed so try and do it as fast as you can. There are terminals where you can trade souls for items to help you in the fight. There are many more aspects of the game to discover by playing it for yourself!! The music in the game is (Serenity - Lofi Hip Hop Beat) by Riddiman. This game is inspired by Terraria and Starbound.
